definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: The study on temple economy is an important field of religion.
sentences.chinese: 寺院經濟研究，是宗教學研究的重要領域。

sentences.english: The local phenomena of religious ritual is a very important issue in religious studies.
sentences.chinese: 宗教儀式的本土化現象是宗教學研究的主題。

sentences.english: Your daddy and I studied in University of Fribourg, Switzerland together.
sentences.chinese: 他是我國當代著名的哲學和宗教學教授。

sentences.english: This is an interdisciplinary study conducted between religion and gender studies.
sentences.chinese: 本論文是在宗教學與女性學交叉研究的基礎上進行的。
